title: Does % damage reduction stack like slows or crits?
body:
Slows take the highest value, crits just add them together.

Like if urgot ran exhaust with his passive and ninja tabis, lets say an enemy would have done 800 damage to him... is it 50+20+12 or just 50% damage reduction assuming it is an AA? Or is it like how slows used to work .5x.8x.88?
